texts: [spoken]The bard's tales have inspired me! I want to be just like Talos the soldier!
[spoken]I will go and kill the demiurge's returned form
[spoken]I will dedicate myself to protecting the meek, just like the Avatar did!
[spoken]I wonder if the Holy Ring is still in the fields near Hanging Tree...
[spoken]I want to seek the holy ring in the fields of Hanging Tree!
[spoken]I will undertake the trials of Smidge Ridge just like the avatar!
[spoken]I found the holy ring! It was under the sofa.
[portrait fairy_queen]Now I will fulfill my ancient promise and open the way to the east.
[portrait bard]Okay, I'll come back to the mission.
[portrait boss]I don't have any bards to send there.
[portrait boss]I've already sent someone to {townName}. I should call him back before I send someone else.
[spoken]I've learned a tale of the avatar from the people here!
[portrait boss]{townName} is too dangerous for me to send bards to right now.
[portrait boss]Tell me what you know about the Avatar.
[spoken]Aaaah! Goblins! I'm getting out of here.
